questions.question: Analyze how the writer uses language and structure to present the relationship between [character A] and [character B] in this extract.
questions.answer:
The writer presents the relationship through:

Language techniques:
1. Dialogue: [Analysis of how speech reveals relationship dynamics] (3 marks)
2. Imagery/metaphor: [How figurative language shows relationship] (2 marks)
3. Tone and register: [How language choices reflect power dynamics] (2 marks)

Structural techniques:
1. Positioning of characters: [Physical placement and its significance] (2 marks)
2. Pace and rhythm: [How sentence structure affects tension] (2 marks)
3. Focus and perspective: [Whose viewpoint is emphasized and why] (1 mark)
questions.explanation: This question requires analysis of both language and structure, showing how they work together to present relationships.
